charges.charge_description: FORGERY, ALTERATION OF CERTIFICATES APPROVING POULTRY PRODUCT ITEMS FOR EXPORT(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Def. placed on 3 yrs. prob.; def. must comply with the terms of the Consent Decision and Order between parties; Def. fined $200,000 as to Cts. 1 &; 2 w/$250 S.A. as to Cts. 1 &; 2; Def. to pay the cost of prosecution of $75,000.

charges.charge_description: FORGERY, ALTERATION OF CERTIFICATES APPROVING MEAT FOOD PRODUCT ITEMS FOR EXPORT(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Def. placed on 3 yrs. prob.; def. must comply with the terms of the Consent Decision and Order between parties; Def. fined $200,000 as to Cts. 1 &; 2 w/$250 S.A. as to Cts. 1 &; 2; Def. to pay the cost of prosecution of $75,000.
